official_title: Resolved, that the following-named Member be, and is hereby elected a Member of the following standing committee of the House of Representatives: Gene Taylor of Missouri:  Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

summary.text: Provides for the election of Gene Taylor, of Missouri, to the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service of the House of Representatives.

titles.title: Resolved, that the following-named Member be, and is hereby elected a Member of the following standing committee of the House of Representatives: Gene Taylor of Missouri:  Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
